name: Space Infiltrator
description:
Your Mission
  1. Approach and destroy enemy spaceship defenses.
  2. Land your spacecraft and infiltrate enemy spaceship.
  3. Override consoles and sabotage enemy spaceship.

Are you ready to initialize mission?

Thanks to your magnetic boots, making it possible to walk on roofs and walls, the mission should be completed in no time!

Controls spacecraft: UP/DOWNSpeed up/downLEFT/RIGHTYawW/SPitchA/DRoll On foot: W/A/S/DMoveMouseLookMouse Left ClickShootMouse Right ClickAimRReloadEInteract
